content.en: Spatial image segmentation: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to improve image segmentation by incorporating spatial information. These algorithms, such as the Expectation Maximization (EM) framework and Gaussian mixture models with spatial smoothness constraints, aim to accurately estimate the number of components in image segmentation and enhance the segmentation process. By attributing agency to these algorithms, researchers are developing more advanced techniques to improve image analysis and interpretation.
content.da: Rummelig billedsegmentering: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre billedsegmentering ved at inkorporere rummelige informationer. Disse algoritmer, såsom Expectation Maximization (EM)-rammeværket og Gaussiske blandingsmodeller med rumlige glathedsbegrænsninger, sigter mod at estimere antallet af komponenter i billedsegmentering præcist og forbedre segmenteringsprocessen. Ved at tilskrive disse algoritmer en form for handlekraft udvikler forskere mere avancerede teknikker til at forbedre billedanalyse og -fortolkning.
